data.title: Xfinity TV Channel Guide by Plan
data.meta_description: Wondering what TV channels are available with Xfinity? Explore channel lineups for Xfinity's Starter, Preferred, and Premier TV plans.
data.text:
Xfinity channel guide

Find which Xfinity TV packages have your favorite channels.

What channels are included in my regional Xfinity package?

Knowing what channels come in Xfinity TV packages makes it easier to choose the best one for your home. We’ve listed full channel lineups for each Xfinity TV package below in every region Xfinity services (South/Central, Northeast, West).

Xfinity South/Central channel guide

Xfinity’s South/Central region includes the following states: Alabama, Arkansas, Florida, Georgia, Illinois, Indiana, Kentucky, Louisiana, Michigan, Mississippi, South Carolina and Tennessee.

Xfinity Northeast channel guide

Xfinity’s Northeast region includes the following states: Connecticut, Delaware, District of Columbia, Maine, Maryland, Massachusetts, New Hampshire, New Jersey, New York, North Carolina, Ohio, Pennsylvania, Rhode Island, Vermont, Virginia and West Virginia.

Xfinity Stream

Xfinity Stream allows you to stream live TV along with thousands of shows and movies on demand. If you’re at home, you can stream all the content included in your current Xfinity plan. If you are outside your home, you’ll still be able to stream over 250+ channels, depending on what’s included in your Xfinity TV plan.

FAQs

What is Xfinity’s Popular TV lineup?

Xfinity’s Popular TV package includes 125+ channels including ABC, AMC, ESPN, and Disney among other popular channels. Check our our Xfinity TV review for more package info.

Is the Xfinity channel lineup good?

Xfinity has great channel lineups, but they vary by region. Xfinity also offers affordable packages so you’ll be able to find one to fit your budget and entertainment needs.

What Xfinity channels are included in Xfinity packages?

Xfinity channels vary by region and plan, so check Xfinity channels based on your location first.
